name: Gloop Drop
description:
Move Blob left and right to catch the falling GLOOP DROPS. The longer you play, the faster they drop!

Reach 10,000 points for a "special" surprise. Earn a free life with every 1000 points.

If you like the classic arcade games from the 1980s (and cute, slimy monsters!), you're in for a real retro treat with Gloop Drop — especially if you've ever played Kaboom!

FEATURES:
- Classic arcade style gameplay.
- Casual gaming.
- Game Center support.
- Leaderboards & Achievements.

** This game is free to play but offers in-app purchases to increase the number of per game continues from 1x (included) up to 4x. **

---
Kaboom! is an Activision video game published in 1981 for the Atari 2600. It was designed by Larry Kaplan and is an unauthorized adaptation of the 1978 Atari coin-op game, Avalanche.
